glsa.title: IPython: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in IPython could result in execution of arbitrary JavaScript.

background.p: IPython is an advanced interactive shell for Python.

description.p: IPython does not properly check the MIME type of a file.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted text file using IPython, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary JavaScript with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All IPython users should upgrade to the latest version:
